This study independent commercial interest . The purpose trial compare safety effectiveness bio-active-stent ( Titan-2® ) everolimus-eluting stent ( Xience V® , Promus® ) patient present acute coronary syndrome . A total 850 patient include randomized study . The primary end point ( MACE ) composite cardiac death , myocardial infarction target lesion revascularization 12 month follow-up . Enrollment patient start November 2008 end 2009 .
